columns.Wrestler_ID: The unique identifier for each wrestler in the table.
columns.Name: The full name of the wrestler competing in events.
columns.Reign: The number of times the wrestler held a championship.
columns.Days_held: The total days the wrestler held the championship title.
columns.Location: The venue or city where the event took place.
columns.Event: The name of the event where the wrestler participated.

wrestler.table_description: The table tracks details about wrestlers and their championship reigns.

columns.Elimination_ID: The unique identifier for each elimination event.
columns.Wrestler_ID: The identifier for the wrestler being eliminated.
columns.Team: The name of the team the wrestler belongs to.
columns.Eliminated_By: The name of the wrestler who performed the elimination.
columns.Elimination_Move: The technique used to eliminate the wrestler.
columns.Time: The time during the match when the elimination occurred.

Elimination.table_description: The table records details about wrestler eliminations in events.
